accounts.name: playerHabitatTokenAccount
docs: Check habitat ownership with mutually exlusive accounts logic

accounts.name: playerParentHabitatTokenAccount
docs: If habitat is sub-habitat (mint constraint is checked within the ix):

instructions.name: migrateHabitatData
docs: this function is to handle cases where there are habitat_data needs migration
and needs to zero out trailing bytes

fields.name: habitatMint
docs: the mint pubkey of the habitat

fields.name: renewalTimestamp
docs: the last renewal timestamp or the first use timestamp

fields.name: expiryTimestamp
docs: timestamp for when the habitat is fully decayed

fields.name: nextDayTimestamp
docs: the next 24-hour period for ki and crystal refinement

fields.name: crystalsRefined
docs: crystals refined for the current 24-hour period

fields.name: kiHarvested
docs: ki harvested for the current 24-hour period

fields.name: seedsSpawned
docs: whether this habitat has spawned seeds already

fields.name: isSubHabitat
docs: whether this habitat is a sub-habitat

fields.name: parentHabitat
docs: the pubkey for the parent habitat

fields.name: harvesterRoyaltyBips
docs: royalty fees paid to habitat owner

fields.name: harvesterOpenMarket
docs: whether harvester sign-up is open to the market

fields.name: active
docs: originally created to designate when a habitat has finished terraforming

fields.name: subHabitatCooldownTimestamp
docs: timestamp for when it can be added as a sub again

fields.name: harvesterSettingsCooldownTimestamp
docs: timestamp for when harvester settings can be changed again

fields.name: harvestEfficiencyDecayStartTimestamp
docs: when the harvest efficiency starts decaying (for guilds only)

fields.name: harvestEfficiencyDisabled
docs: whether harvest efficiency feature is disabled (paid, for guilds only)

fields.name: hibernationAttempts
docs: how many times have hibernation been done in this lifecycle

fields.name: treasury
docs: Treasury key to receive all the payments

fields.name: kiApprover
docs: The key for doing approvals for KI minting

fields.name: kiSubmitter
docs: The key for submitting KI mint requests, hot wallet on server

fields.name: genesisHabitatCollection
docs: key for the genesis collection nft

fields.name: crystalMints
docs: Crystals mints, index is same as enum

fields.name: classicSeedCreator
docs: Classic Terraform seed creator from Genesis Genopet FLP

fields.name: terraformingGeneCosts
docs: GENE required per seed grade for terraforming

fields.name: terraformingKiCosts
docs: KI required per seed grade for terraforming

fields.name: upgradingGeneCosts
docs: GENE required per level for upgrading

fields.name: upgradingKiCosts
docs: KI required per level for upgrading

fields.name: upgradingCrystalCosts
docs: Crystals required per level for upgrading

fields.name: kiHarvestingWaitingPeriods
docs: The different amounts of KI rates with the waiting periods

fields.name: dailyKiHarvestingCap
docs: Daily harvesting cap based on level of habitats

fields.name: gameDayTime
docs: How long each game day is, default 1 rl day

fields.name: habitatTerraformingDays
docs: How many days does it take to terraform a habitat

fields.name: rentalAgreementTreasuryShareBips
docs: Shares in bips given to treasury for rental agreements

fields.name: harvesterTreasuryShareBips
docs: Shares in bips given to treausry for harvesting agreements

fields.name: maxHibernationChancesPerCycle
docs: max hibernation chances for reg and guild habs

fields.name: harvestEfficiencyDecayByDay
docs: the harvest efficiency decay by day

fields.name: startTimestamp
docs: Timestamp of when this account was initialized

fields.name: endTimestamp
docs: Timestamp of when this Locked Habitat is withdrawable

fields.name: startTimestamp
docs: Timestamp of when this account was initialized

fields.name: endTimestamp
docs: Timestamp of when this KI is withdrawable

fields.name: habitat
docs: Which habitat is this generated by

fields.name: royaltyRateBips
docs: royalty rate in bips (paid to landlord)

fields.name: durableNonceAccount
docs: each player gets their own durable nonce

fields.name: rentToken
docs: rent mint, must be spl token

fields.name: gracePeriod
docs: grace period where rent can be unpaid

fields.name: openMarket
docs: whether the rental agreement is open to the market
